name: Homemade Almond Milk
author: Steph S.
summary: Almond milk is a delicious and healthier alternative to soy and cow milk. It's easy to make and very delicious. The longer you soak the almonds, the creamier the milk turns out.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon agave nectar, or more to taste
directions: Place almonds in a bowl and pour in enough water to cover; soak at least 12 hours
Blend almonds and 3 cups water in a blender on low speed for 10 seconds
Blend almonds and water on high speed for 60 seconds
Pour mixture through cheesecloth or a nut bag into a bowl
Discard the pulp or save for another use
Clean the blender and return milk to blender; add agave nectar and salt
